title: IDEA: Change Keen colors to VGA!!!
content: I have no idea if this is possible, but can someone change the Keen palette into VGA?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]  I think it would be a good idea.[img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: IDEA: Change Keen colors to VGA!!!
content:
It'd probably be imposible.
The closest thing would probably be Z-1's game if he makes the original tiles and sprites (which he won't)[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: IDEA: Change Keen colors to VGA!!!
content:
If this was possible don't you think we'd have done this a long time ago?-----
[img]http://gnosticus.spatang.com/PBF056BCPuppyWish.jpg[/img]

title: Vorticons Galaxy Aliens
content:
Given the source code for the original games it could be done, but even then it would require going through all the graphics and redrawing them in 256-colour.

It would also take alot of time and skill to match the awesome quality of the existing 16-colour tiles... 256 gives alot of flexibility, but it's easily abused.

Maybe upping the resolution to 640x480 would make it worthwhile... but it's still just as much work.

Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"This is how liberty dies--with thunderous applause." -Padme

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Vorticons Galaxy Aliens
content: Yeah, there would too much work.. Too bad the iD team didn't make 256-colour version.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Vorticons Galaxy Aliens
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Too bad the iD team didn't make 256-colour version.[hr][/quote]

They Should've make it.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] If they had made it, It would of been a sign of Keens 7-9, the episodes we've all been waiting for!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: wording
content:
Would have... It would have been a sign of more Keen to come. :-) You may say it "would of" when speaking aloud, but when writing it, it's "would have."

Part of the charm of Keen, in my opinion, is the amazing environments and atmospheres the iD team created using only 16 colors. It's truly a demonstration of artistic talent, being able to convey an idea clearly with limited resources. (My opinion, anyway.)

Just keep your eyes on z-1's new game, then, for higher color Keen. :-)

title: Re: wording
content: You may think this is weird but my favorite game palette is EGA.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]  (or maybe [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]  ?)[img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: wording
content:
No point e-mailing iD. They suck. Stupid Wolfenstein.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

"You may think this is weird but my favorite game palette is EGA."
Well, you're not the only one. There's probably thousand people thinking the same, including me. Or well, there really isn't any EGA palette, it's just 16 colours (correct if I'm wrong).You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Not a pallete? Hmm...
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]there really isn't any EGA palette, it's just 16 colours (correct if I'm wrong).[hr][/quote]

You could be right, but then again, Duke Nukem 2 seems to change the EGA palette, which could mean that EGA is a palette of 16 colors that are rarely different form the ones used in Keens 1-6 and dreams.

title: Re: Not a pallete? Hmm...
content:
Well, is there any reason to use other colours, if the palette used in Keen is good of making graphics? Nope. And as we know olde EGA games are colourful; that palette in Keen is good for having many different colours.

"You could be right, but then again, Duke Nukem 2 seems to change the EGA palette, which could mean that EGA is a palette of 16 colors that are rarely different form the ones used in Keens 1-6 and dreams."
Maybe you got me wrong. I mean that EGA is ability to use 16 colours. The actual palette (=the colours) can vary, depending on game artists; what they want to see.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Not a pallete? Hmm...
content:
Th Keen color palette seems the most common.A proud member of the beta testing society
